column6: Elektra's next assignment was supposed to be a walk on the beach - literally ... taking out a Russian mobster in Brighton Beach. But something has shaken Elektra up, turning this easy hit into a life and death struggle.  32 PGS./MARVEL PSR+...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Steven Cummings | penciller (cover):Tom Fleming | inker:Sandu Florea | writer:Rob Rodi
